extends AbstractRover<SmartPercepts>
    A class from which Smart Rovers can derive.

    • Method Detail

      • setModel

        public void setModel(edu.rice.comp440.rovers.model.Model model)
        Description copied from class: AbstractRover
        Extending classes should take this method as an opportunity to reach into the model's percept factories and retrieve an instance of their chosen percepts. It might seem logical to task the Model with "giving" a Percept to a Rover instance, and not the other way around like here, but we run into a problem: Rovers are parameterized by the specific Percept type that they accept (in order to have absolute type safety when calling nextAction(...)), which means that we would force Model to become aware of the specific parameterized type of the Rovers it is holding. That would be a nightmare. Instead, we task the varying Rovers themselves with awareness of the Percept they desire.
        Overrides:
        setModel in class AbstractRover<SmartPercepts>
        Parameters:
        model - The model

      • step

        public Action step()
        Description copied from class: AbstractRover
        This is the method that will be called by Model when it wants to step the simulation forward. Extending classes should then take their chosen Percept and use it to call nextAction(...). The action returned by nextAction(...) will be returned here to the model.
        Specified by:
        step in class AbstractRover<SmartPercepts>
        Returns:
        The action this rover wants to take.
